name: Flappy Rocket (coders)
description:
Flappy rocket is a fun game built on buildbox!

Kinda like flappy bird, ur a rocket and u have to collect as many dots as possible!

Are you up to the challenge?

controls

click to jump

Don't worry if windows smart screen says it's dangerous its only bc buildbox doesn't let u put author name.

Note: I have not tried Mac bc I don’t have one so can someone test and tell me if it works?
